action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To modify and extend the temporary authority of the President to modify certain contracts and options based on the impacts of inflation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defense Contract Inflation Adjustment Act of 2023.

section.header: Modification and extension of temporary authority to modify certain contracts and options based on the impacts of inflation
section.text: Section 1 of Public Law 85–804 (50 U.S.C. 1431) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by adding at the end the following new sentence: If any such amounts are so specifically provided, the Secretary may use them for such purposes.; and
in subsection (e), by striking December 31, 2023 and inserting December 31, 2024.
